question: 縦書
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Vertical</kanji> <kanji>writing</kanji> is <vocabulary>vertical writing</vocabulary>. That's when you see Japanese and it's written top to bottom instead of sideways.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are the reading you learned with the kanji <ja>縦</ja> and <ja>かき</ja> (changes to <ja>がき</ja>), though the <ja>き</ja> gets smushed inside the kanji, because it wants to be confusing like that.
